title: About
content:
Who are we? A small software development outfit who challenges the status quo. We believe that social media and personal branding is the future of entertainment and communication. The tools available to address this space are archaic and geared towards marketers and businesses; not individuals. We started this company to change that. Why? Because we are creators. We are artists, musicians, podcasters, streamers, editors, writers, and film makers. We've all experienced the pain and struggle of growing and managing a brand in the social media world. 

What is Teff? Teff is the smallest grain in the world grown regionally in the horn of Africa. Our team
subtitle: The Name and Team
